statements.query: MATCH ()<-[r:TAGGED]-(:Tag) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (t:Tag) WHERE NOT (t)-[:TAGGED]->() DELETE (t) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
statements.__comment__: Remove tags that aren't linked to anything anymore.
